keys: Ciencias SESE. Desarrollo de habilidades. Recurso adicional
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4361</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">All About Investigating</string>
            <string language="es">Todo sobre la investigación</string>
            <string language="ga">Gach Rud faoi Fhiosrú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganz Über Das Nachforschen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tout Au sujet de l'Investigation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toda Sobre Investigar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Interamente Circa Studiare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλοι για την έρευνα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information about why and how teachers can help children to develop their investigating skills. Relevant to all 4 content strands of the curriculum, it provides a list of class starter questions.</string>
            <string language="es">Información sobre porqué y cómo los profesores pueden ayudar a los niños a desarrollar sus habilidades de investigación. Relevante para las 4 partes de contenido del curriculum, ofrece una lista de las preguntas para empezar la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas faoin fáth agus an chaoi ar féidir le múinteoirí cabhrú le leanaí a scileanna fiosraithe a fhorbairt. Bainteach le gach ceann de na ceithre sraith ar an gcuraclam, cuireann sé liosta ar fáil de cheisteanna chun an rang a thosú.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias SESE. Desarrollo de habilidades. Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Skills Development</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbairt Scileanna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen ungefähr, warum und wie Lehrer 
einmachen, Kindern helfen Sie, ihre nachforschenden Fähigkeiten zu 
entwickeln. Relevant zu allen 4 zufriedenen Fasern des 
Lehrplans, liefert es eine Liste der Kategorie Starterfragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information environ pourquoi et comment les 
professeurs mettent en boîte aidez les enfants à développer leurs 
qualifications d'investigation. Approprié à chacun des 4 brins
contents du programme d'études, elle fournit une liste de questions 
de démarreur de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação aproximadamente porque e como os 
professores enlatam ajude a crianças desenvolver suas habilidades 
investigando. Relevante a todas as 4 costas satisfeitas do 
curriculum, fornece uma lista de perguntas do acionador de partida da 
classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni circa perchè e come gli 
insegnanti inscatolano aiuti i bambini a sviluppare le loro abilità 
di studio. Relativo a tutti e 4 i fili soddisfatti del programma
di studi, forniscono una lista delle domande del dispositivo 
d'avviamento del codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για γιατί και το πώς οι δάσκαλοι μπορούν 
να βοηθήσουν τα παιδιά για να αναπτύξουν τις δεξιότητες έρευνάς 
τους. Σχετικό και με στα 4 ικανοποιημένα σκέλη του 
προγράμματος σπουδών, παρέχει έναν κατάλογο ερωτήσεων εκκινητών
κλάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fähigkeiten Entwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développement de Qualifications</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvimento Das Habilidades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo Di Abilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη δεξιοτήτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
